title: Penguin's Memory: Shiawase Monogatari
synopsis: Mike is a penguin soldier who returns home after being injured during combat. Estranged from his family and friends, he leaves his hometown and starts to roam adrift through the country.
staff: [['Moriwaki, Makoto', ['Storyboard']], ['Hikone, Norio', ['Storyboard', ' Original Character Design']], ['Kanemori, Yoshinori', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Nagaoka, Akinori', ['Chief Animation Director']]]
